Home » 13S4 Saḷāyatanavaggasaṃyuttapāḷi » 9 Asaṅkhatasaṃyutta » 9.2 Dutiyavagga » 9.2.1 Asaṅkhatasutta
9.2.1.4 Suññatasamādhi
Asaṅkhatasaṃyutta
Dutiyavagga
Asaṅkhatasutta
Suññatasamādhi
1699Katamo ca, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo? Suññato samādhi. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo…pe…  katamo ca, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo? Animitto samādhi. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo…pe…  katamo ca, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo? Appaṇihito samādhi. Ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asaṅkhatagāmimaggo…pe… . (1.6--8)
